评论概述: Don’t buy this shirt unless you like to iron
评论详情: Shirt was so wrinkled Had to wash it and wrinkles still were terrible. Awful

I originally bought L and they were a little snug. Returned and bought the XL and ran it through the wash and dried it to get it to shrink, worked perfectly. They will shrink if you use heat in the dryer. I wash on gentle now and low heat in the dryer as the fit is good. It's tough to find clothes that fit me off the rack, let alone from amazon. Short bodybuilder build (48 inchish chest, 19 inch arms). I paired these with Lion Nardo shorts from amazon as well. Great combo, you will not find more comfortable clothes that look nice and breath. I am in the south and they are comfortable. I bought every color and most of the colors in the short sleeve version. I wish they had more colors, I would buy them all. I wear them instead of t-shirts now. Sleeves are a little long even after shrinking, I roll them so I don't care but be aware if you plan on wearing with the sleeves down. I've washed them several times and they've held up, hopefully they will continue to do so. Wash them gentle (after you shrink if needed, THEY WILL SHRINK), dry on low/medium heat and hang them up quick, they will wrinkle - it's linen (or part linen). If you are thinking about it, pull the trigger on these. The more you wash them, the more comfortable they become, it has honestly blown my mind how much I love these.

评论概述: Repackaged shirts crumpled in bags. Sizing completely incorrect.
评论详情: I ordered three shirts in different colors. Each shirt came packaged a bit differently. One was clearly new, neatly folded, and in a quality bag with a ziplock-style closure. The other two were in plastic bags with adhesive seals. One was folded and the other was crumpled into the bag. I chose to open the crumpled one (I couldn't do any harm to it) and found that the XL I ordered (and the tag says XL) was barely the size of a medium.

I really like this linen blend shirt.  It's flattering to wear and looks good both with the sleeves buttoned and with the sleeves unbuttoned and rolled up.  The only real drawbacks are 1) it wrinkles easily (the nature of linen) and 2) getting the right size can be tough because it's not standard American sizing.  Use the size chart to make sure you get the right size, especially since there's no stretch to the material.  Might be tight in the upper arms if you have above average muscles/shoulders.Shirts are a blend of linen and cotton, so not pure linen.  Still has the linen look, and the cotton makes wrinkling a tiny bit harder.  I ordered a few colors.  They match what's shown on the screen, so no surprises there.  I find these shirts good for hot weather and they're meant to be worn without an undershirt so as to keep you cool in hot weather. Recommended.

Got this as a gift for someone's birthday and it looked amazing on him and kept him cool in the hot Mexican sun in the beginning of summer. Amazing purchase got it in 2 colors and he might buy more for himself.

评论概述: Not thin or gauzy & fits small
评论详情: I was trying to find a thin, breathable, long sleeve shirt for my husband to wear while he works outside in the summer. I often see Hispanics wearing thin, almost see-through shirts on work crews & that's what I was aiming for. I read the reviews on this shirt, and the photos looked right, but the shirt turned out to not be thin at all. The fabric seems tightly woven and could be worn in winter.  My husband is a true XL, 6' tall & 214 lbs and the XL was a little snug. So, order a size up and don't expect this to be a true summer-breezy shirt.
I would purchase again. Fits well on me.

评论概述: Nice shirt but many are returned & arrive used
评论详情: This shirt provides good value - it's inexpensive and nice. I've ordered quite a few and the only issue is that many times it's clear the shirt has previously been worn, or at least tried on, and the returned and there was no care taken in the repackaging before it was shipped out again. Shirts usually arrive wrinkled and not in original packaging. As long as you don't mind this, it's a good shirt.
